entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sackville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:14 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Freezing drizzle. High minus 1 except plus 3 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle except drizzle over southern sections. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1 except plus 3 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:41 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Drizzle over southern sections early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 1:41 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:41 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
